DOC.brief_summary: A study to compare rofecoxib versus naproxen in the treatment of Chinese patients with rheumatoid arthritis.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Rofecoxib Versus Naproxen in the Treatment of Chinese Patient With Rheumatoid Arthritis (0966-231)
DOC.criteria: Chinese males or females at least 18 years of age with rheumatoid arthritis
